main.name: Petra Kirschner
main.description: Roll down to see my bio, works, experiences and skills. Feel free to contact me.
main.bio: I have experiences mostly in pop concert culture. I have organized and worked for several festivals all over the country, organized and managed numerous concerts, worked for large event organizing companies, did booking management and brand management for an A-listed hungarian band, and earlier I have been working on city branding as well. I learnt how to manage a project, how to delegate tasks and lead a team well, how to negotiate hard and also how to be accurate at administration and contracting. Now, I'm ready to learn more, and seek new challenges.
main.contactmessage1: I hope our business relationship will continue in the future.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

work.title: Booking Manager
work.description: Concert organizing and sales associate for a large Hungarian band. Included job duties: organization of annual/semi-annual plans, negotiation, business, contract management and adminsitration, project management (team leading), brand management and market research.

work.title: Program/Concert organizer
work.description: Program and concert organizer, program coordinator at a central event venue of Budapest. Included job duties: Preparation of an annual and semi-annual program plan, continuous monitoring of the market, market research, negotiation, business, contracting and adminsitration, event managment, keeping in touch with domestic and foreign partners, attending professional conferences.

work.title: Program organizer/coordinator
work.description: Program management, concert, festival and cultural event organization for a large company (included several outdoor and indoor venues) Included job duties: Preparation of an annual and semi-annual program plan, negotiation, business, continuous monitoring of the market, complete management of the online communication, project management, meeting schedules, event management, attending professional conferences, overseeing and analyzing foreign markets.

testimonials.text: You’ve been with us for so many years, you are a part of our NEARC family. You may not understand all of our nerdy GIS speak, but you fit right in and we are so thankful you are with us

Thank you very sincerely for your expert services in the production of the Roundtable's Summer Celebration. To say that -we couldn't have done it without you- is a gross understatement... and you can quote me on that!
